history.proof: intros m i z. induction i. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), Iter (cA_1 m zero) i z = Iter (MA0.f_1 m) i z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
MA0.Iter_f_1_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) (S i) z = Iter (MA0.f_1 m) i (MA0.f_1 m z)
MA0.Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) i (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = z
MA0.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) j (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = Iter (MA0.f m) (i - j) z
MF.Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MF.f_1 m) i (Iter (MF.f m) i z) = z
MF.Iter_f_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MF.f m) (S i) z = Iter (MF.f m) i (MF.f m z)
MA0.Iter_comp : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), Iter (MA0.f m) (i + j) z = Iter (MA0.f m) i (Iter (MA0.f m) j z)
MF.Iter_comp : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), Iter (MF.f m) (i + j) z = Iter (MF.f m) i (Iter (MF.f m) j z)
MF.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MF.f_1 m) j (Iter (MF.f m) i z) = Iter (MF.f m) (i - j) z
MA0.f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.f_1 m (Iter (MA0.f m) (S i) z) = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MF.f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.f_1 m (Iter (MF.f m) (S i) z) = Iter (MF.f m) i z
MF.degree_diff : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> forall i : nat, (0 < i < MF.degree m z)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) i z <> z
MF.degree_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.degree m z in (0 < p)%nat /\ Iter (MF.f m) p z = z /\ (forall i : nat, (0 < i < p)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) i z <> z)
MF.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MF.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MF.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f_1 m) n z)
MF.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.Iter_upb m z = MA0.Iter_upb m (Iter (MA0.f m) i z)
MF.period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.Iter_upb m (Iter (MF.f m) i z)
cF_L1_x_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (i <= j < dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i x = Iter (cF m) i x
cF_L1_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> (i <= dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i x = Iter (cF m) i x
expf_B0_CS_1_a_prel1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let p := MF.Iter_upb m x_1 in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in xb0 = Iter (cF m) j x_1 -> (i <= j < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z
between_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in betweenf m x_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
MF.degree_per : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MF.f m) (MF.degree m z) z = z
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_B0_CS_1_b_prel1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in let p := MF.Iter_upb m xh0_1 in let z := Iter (cF m) i xh0_1 in x0 = Iter (cF m) j xh0_1 -> (i <= j < p)%nat -> expf (B m zero x) xh0_1 z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
MA0.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MA0.f m) nr z = z
MF.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MF.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MF.f m) nr z = z
MF.degree_unicity : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.degree m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k
MF.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in (j < p)%nat -> (k < p)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
MA0.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f m) n z)
MF.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MF.f m) n z)
cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j < dx - 1)%nat -> (j + 1 + i <= dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 = Iter (cF m) (j + 1 + i) x
exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m k z)
between_expf_L0_4_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m y_0_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_B0_CS_1_c_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x0 xb0 -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (B m zero x) z t
diff_cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> (j + 1 + i <= dx - 1)%nat -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 <> x
MA0.expo_between_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.expo1 m z t < -> MA0.between m z t (MA0.f_1 m z)

``` 
intros m i z.
induction i.
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. reflexivity.
